alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 12:44AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gosper and northern Furnas Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holbrook, or 27 miles north of Norton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Arapahoe around 100 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Edison and Bertrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
